item.description:
How about we make a dinner flight to Barnes, KBAF. Leave at 6:00. Eat out on their outdoor patio facing the runway. Then, once we're over gross, we can make a few turns around their pattern with the help of the tower. We can get our night currency as well. Leave the pax on the ground of you want and get current.

Barnes has a great 4 star restaurant. Great food and usually we can catch a few jets taking off.

Wheels off the ground for this Friday night flight at 6:00.... Be there!

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Friday Fly For Food and Night Currency at KBAF
